title: A moche profitable treatise against the pestilence translated into Eglyshe by Thomas Paynel Chanon of Martin Abbey.
author: Paynell, Thomas.
publisher: In aedibus Thomae Bertheleti regii impressoris],
notes: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon.
Running title reads: Remedy agaynst the pestilence.
Some print slightly faded; title page marked and stained.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
